config.lotrextended.barrowWightChestFirs: Should stone chests in the barrow downs spawn wight on first open. 0=only when cursed, 100=spawns on every first open like in legacy
config.lotrextended.barsConnectToBranche: Make bars and panes connect to branch blocks
config.lotrextended.barsConnectToSlabSid: Make bars and panes connect to half sides of vertical slabs
config.lotrextended.bellRingChainMaxLeng: Max chain length a bell ring will attempt
config.lotrextended.dripstoneMinimumDama: Set the height at which dripstone hurts entities when interacting, (0.0 is the default value in renewed)
config.lotrextended.enableChairProtectio: Allow players sit on seats in banner-protected areas (global setting overriding banner spicific settings)
config.lotrextended.enableChairSlabSitti: Allow players to sit on slabs or stairs (overrides all below)
config.lotrextended.enableChairSwapping: Allow players to switch seats without standing
config.lotrextended.enableDevMode: 除非你是复兴拓展开发团队的一员或正在开发该模组，否则永远不要启用此选项！
config.lotrextended.enableDevModeClient: 除非你是复兴拓展开发团队的一员或正在测试该模组，否则永远不要启用此选项！
config.lotrextended.enableExtendedLoggin: Toggle to show additional log information if stuff is not working properly
config.lotrextended.enableExtendedSpawnP: Enable extended spawn protection for servers
config.lotrextended.enableFellowshipCrea: 启用或禁用远征队创建（若禁用，管理员仍然可以通过指令创建）
config.lotrextended.enableFixedStructure: Enable fixed structures to generate, OVERRIDES ALL OTHER STRUCTURE SETTINGS!
config.lotrextended.enableLegacyCaptainP: Make captains passive until attacked, like in legacy
config.lotrextended.enableLegacyFeastMod: Enable the eating of food even if player is not hungry, like in legacy
config.lotrextended.enableLegacyTraderPa: Make traders passive until attacked, like in legacy
config.lotrextended.enableLegacyWaypoint: 启用或禁用基于旧版的路径点创建
config.lotrextended.enablePlantParticles: Allow for certian plants to spawn particles.
config.lotrextended.enableQuerkyDuckMode: Enable early extended duck model querkyness.
config.lotrextended.enableRenewedWaypoin: 启用或禁用基于新版的路径点创建
config.lotrextended.enableSpecialLogging: Toggles additional logged information, changes by update, special things
config.lotrextended.enableVanillaEnchant: Enables vanilla enchanting system in Middle Earth
config.lotrextended.enableVanillaXp: Enables Xp orbs and bar in Middle Earth
config.lotrextended.forceStructureBlockA: Force Structure Voids to render inside of Structure Block Outline Rendering.
config.lotrextended.lastClientBootVersio: Last version this mod launched with. Don't touch! Value handled by extended.
config.lotrextended.makeMetalDoorsRequir: Make Extended's metal doors and trapdoors require power to open
config.lotrextended.middleEarthSpawnProt: The radius for Middle Earth spawn server protection
config.lotrextended.npcGlobalSpawnDampin: Reduce the global npc spawning rate, the lower the value, the less spawns. This is a linear setting, (1.0 is the default renewed spawn rate)
config.lotrextended.overworldSpawnProtec: The radius for Overworld spawn server protection (allows larger area than vanilla protection)
config.lotrextended.structureBlockOutlin: Change the distance at which structure block outlines render.
container.lotrextended.repair.reforge: Reforging repairs the item and re-rolls the modifiers.

speechbank.blue_mountains_merchant.depar: %1$s：我不能一直在这里待着。还要去其他地方、买卖其他的商品...
%1$s：如果你还想和我交易，%2$s，那你最好快点！
%1$s：蓝色山脉的财富不会一直在这里等待。
%1$s：这是你得到物美价廉的矮人商品的最后机会！
%1$s：我马上就要离开了，%2$s，但是还有做一两笔买卖的时间！
%1$s：生意不等人，%2$s！我不会在这里待太久。
%1$s：还有其他的地方在等着我！我马上要走了。
%1$s：你想看看蓝色山脉的财富吗？你最好快点，我马上就出发了！
%1$s：时间在流逝，%2$s！如果你想和我做买卖，现在就来！
speechbank.breeland_merchant.departure.1: %1$s：我听闻有黑骑手在附近游荡，我不能在这里待太久。
speechbank.breeland_merchant.departure.3: %1$s: If you'd like some Bree-land goods, now is your last chance!
speechbank.breeland_merchant.departure.4: %1$s: I'll be back on the road here soon.
speechbank.breeland_merchant.departure.5: %1$s: I can't be in these lands for too long, don't want robbers or Goblins to get me.
%1$s: My longing for the sea grows ever deeper. I think I shall be leaving soon.
%1$s: My time here is almost at an end.
%1$s: I shall not stay in these lands much longer.
%1$s: The time has almost come to move on.
%1$s: I will not tarry here forever.
%1$s: The wind is calling. I must away soon.
%1$s: If you wish to trade with me, you should hurry. I will be leaving soon.
%1$s: Do you hear the sea calling? I shall soon leave these lands.
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.1: %1$s: Come now, %2$s. Or you shall forever hold your scrap!
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.2: %1$s: %2$s, are you sure you have no scrap to spare? For I shall have to leave soon! I accept firstborns for coin too...
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.3: %1$s: It is almost time for me to leave, %2$s. So hurry if you want me to take your oddments off your hands!
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.4: %1$s: I'm sure we can strike one last deal, %2$s.
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.5: %1$s: Can you spare just a little more scrap before I depart these forsaken lands?
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.6: %1$s: It's the scrap that's never collected that takes longest to sell, %2$s. So before I leave, can you not spare a little more scrap for a poor old oddment collector?
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.7: %1$s: I shall soon be taking a well-earned break. So, quickly, %2$s, bring me your last scrap!
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.8: %1$s: I fear this place has little else to offer me in the scrap market. I shall soon depart to richer lands.
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.9: %1$s: The scrap that one hoards is worth little more than pebbles, %2$s. So come now and sell that rubbish of yours before I go far away!
speechbank.oddment_collector.departure.1: %1$s: The road must go on, %2$s! Who am I but a humble scrap collector to stop it. So before I hasten over the hills, let me rid you of any unwanted odds and ends.
%1$s: Come trade with me quickly, %2$s! For I shall soon be leaving these lands to seek the wealth of the Gundabad Orcs.
%1$s: I'm feeling thirsty, %2$s. A stay at a good inn would do me well! Luckily I know one near the mountains blue, so come quick or you shall miss me.
%1$s: A rest in a comfortable bed beckons, %2$s. Oddment collectors have to sleep too!
%1$s: Roll up, roll up! Last scrap deals for many weeks!
%1$s: Do you have no more scrap, %2$s? Then I shall have to leave.
%1$s: We scrap collectors move often to find the best sources of oddments. I am no exception, %2$s.
%1$s: Business is slow here. Perhaps it is time to seek my fortunes elsewhere.
%1$s: I hear the Mango-Men of Harad have plenty of scrap iron. Perhaps I should seek them instead of waiting for you to empty your pockets, %2$s.
%1$s: My longing for the sea grows ever deeper. I think I shall be leaving soon.
%1$s: My time here is almost at an end.
%1$s: I shall not stay in these lands much longer.
%1$s: The time has almost come to move on.
%1$s: I will not tarry here forever.
%1$s: The wind is calling. I must away soon.
%1$s: If you wish to trade with me, you should hurry. I will be leaving soon.
%1$s: Do you hear the sea calling? I shall soon leave these lands.
